text: August Anthony Alsina Jr. (born September 3, 1992) is an American singer. He was born in New Orleans. His mother moved him to Houston after Hurricane Katrina happened. Alsina moved to Atlanta to start his musical career. He released his first mixtape, The Product in 2012. He released two other mixtapes in the same year. In August 2013 he was signed to Def Jam Recordings. His first EP Downtown: Life Under the Gun was released by Def Jam that month. It reached number 68 in the Billboard 200. His first album, Testimony, was released in 2014. The album was a tribute to his friend who died in 2010.August Alsina Feels the ‘Luv’ on R&B Charts With Debut Single – Billboard ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:1992 births Category:African-American musicians Category:Living people Category:Singers from Louisiana Category:American contemporary R&B; singers Category:American hip hop musicians Category:American hip hop singers Category:American singer- songwriters Category:American soul singers Category:Musicians from Louisiana Category:People from New Orleans
title: August Alsina
